occupation: Enterprise Data & Intelligent Automation Engineer at ANZ
headline: Enterprise Data & Intelligent Automation Engineer at ANZ | IIT Bombay

education.school: Shri G S Institute of Technology & Science

accomplishment_projects.title: Deep Learning For Natural Language Processing
accomplishment_projects.description:
Objective: Develop new deep neural network based tools for Indian Language Translation 
• Reviewed NLP pre-processing techniques like identifying stop words for a language and Word embedding Techniques like Continuous Bag of Word (CBOW), Skip Gram, Negative Sampling, Global Vector (GloVe), Count Vector, Term Frequency-Inverse Document Frequency (TF-IDF), Word Co-occurrence matrix with fixed context window• Implemented Word embedding techniques: Continuous Bag of Word(CBOW), Global Vector (GloVe) on Hindi Wikipedia dataset
• Experimented with German to English language Machine Translation model using stacked LSTM 
   Encoder-Decoder architecture
• Implementing language models BERT, ALBERT and XLNET for Hindi Language

accomplishment_projects.title: Application Of Deep Learning In Medical Image Analysis
accomplishment_projects.description:
• Implemented DenseNet which takes Chest X-ray image as input and outputs the probability of 14 thoracic diseases using Transfer Learning along with Heat Map on Chest X-ray showing the most affected area by disease using Class Activation Map
• Reviewed Medical Report generation using Encoder-Decoder architecture using output from DenseNet architecture

accomplishment_projects.title: Credit Card Fraudulent Detection
accomplishment_projects.description:
•Implemented ML algorithm like Random Forest, Multilayer Neural Network, SVM, Logistic regression for the classification task
• Performed EDA, Data Preprocessing (One hot Encoding) and Oversampling using SMOTE technique on the dataset
• Obtained Best accuracy (0.9983) and F1 score (0.99)by Random Forest among all 4 classifiers after oversampling

accomplishment_projects.title: House Price Prediction Using Advanced  Regression Techniques
accomplishment_projects.description:
• Performed EDA using correlation matrix for feature selection and Data Preprocessing
• Implemented algorithms: Light gradient boosting, Extreme gradient boosting, Gradient boosting, Random forest Regressor, Elastic Net regression, and Lasso regression

accomplishment_projects.title: Movie Recommender System
accomplishment_projects.description:
• Implemented collaborative filtering technique to recommend new movies to users on the basis watched movie ratings
• Used cosine similarity& Pearson  correlation coefficient between movies to predict most appropriate new movies for users
• Reviewed gradient descent based approach for movie recommendation by learning both weights and features during training

accomplishment_projects.title: Survey And  Statistical Analysis of IITB Mess Food Quality
accomplishment_projects.description:
• Formed a questionnaire for response collection which served as source data for the entire experiment
 • Applied probabilistic sampling method to generate sample data and performed hypothesis testing on collected data
 • Generalizing the results for population by analyzing and applying statistical tests using various statistical and analytical tools

accomplishment_projects.title: Bikes Rental Prediction Using Linear Regression From Scratch
accomplishment_projects.description:
• Performed One Hot Encoding on categorical features to convert them to numerical features
• Implemented Linear Regression without using ML libraries using MSE, RMSE & MAE as loss  
• Compared result for MSE, RMSE and MAE loss functions using plot between loss vs. epoch

accomplishment_projects.title: Digit Recognizer Using MNIST Dataset
accomplishment_projects.description:
• Implemented Convolution Neural Network using Keras to recognize handwritten digits
• Dropout is used to avoid overfitting and obtained accuracy score of 0.9874on validation set
